welcome_message_body: Welcome to Mataram, a vibrant city known for its rich culture, beautiful beaches, and friendly locals. We invite you to explore our charming city and immerse yourself in all it has to offer. Enjoy your stay!

restaurants.name: Seafood Ikan Bakar 88
restaurants.description: Seafood Ikan Bakar 88 is a seafood restaurant located in Mataram.
restaurants.address: Jalan Pejanggik No. 30 (Depan Kantor Lurah Cakra Barat), Mataram, Nusa Tenggara Barat
